--- title: "Immortal time bias - \"The fallacy that never dies\" (Part 1)" date: 2024-02-09 categories: [concept, survival] #image: description: "Learn why this misattribution of time in a survival analysis can seriously bias your results." --- ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} dat <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/pgseye/data/main/heart.csv", header = T) #data(heart, package="survival") head(dat) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display}
